website_summaries.verdict: Strong collar for large dogs that carries a low price point. Customers appreciate its sharp looking design.
pros: Owners like having two rings on the collar, one for the leash and one for tags
Heavy duty D ring can support dogs up to 150 pounds
Many customers mention the value they receive with this collar's high quality build
cons: Collar isn't designed to fit really small dogs
Ring for tags hangs on side of the collar, rather than bottom

customer_reviews.title: High quality leather collar
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about purchasing this collar because my dog, Oz (a Newfoundland hound mix), was inbetween the sizes listed in the sizing chart. I opted for the larger size and couldn't be happier! Arrived on time(ty Amazon), was packaged well. The quality of this collar is spectacular! I'm SURE this will be the last collar I ever have to buy for my Oz! The leather is a solid piece(not sandwiched like some 'leather' collars), wide, with a sturdy buckle and beautiful finish! It's definately made for a large dog! Do NOT try to buy this thinking it'll make your little dog look tough because this collar is heavy! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: GoldenQueenTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Just..WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this collar as a replacement for the really nice leather one my puppy had. I didn’t want to spend another $45.00 on a collar my pup was going to grow out of again. I figured I’d get a cheap $14.00 collar and upsize again when needed. I had NO idea this collar was so nice! It’s wide, soft, durable leather and I am more than impressed. It’s better quality than the expensive one I bought a few months ago! I will definitely be buying this collar again when he grows out of the medium. Awesome collar, looks fantastic and super fast delivery. Definitely recommend this one!!
customer_reviews.author: ChrisTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great for big dogs and very sturdy and good looking.
customer_reviews.text: Great collar. I have a large American Bulldog and this fits her perfectly. Her neck measures 24". I like that it has two rings. I use one for tags and the other to snap on the leash. It's extremely sturdy and well made with six rivets holding one ring and another six holding the buckle and another ring. Easy to buckle. The fittings are brass and the collar looks high quality. The leather is dark brown, thick and of course being wide it is a big collar, I suppose there are thinner and more comfortable collars out there, but if you want something with strength to hold a big dog ... this is it.
customer_reviews.author: FastPony

customer_reviews.title: Quality of this product is questionable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this collar in November based on the good reviews. The price was great, but one of the hooks tore on the collar within a few months. I was disappointed with the quality of the product and when I tried to contact the seller, Beirui, I received responses from Amazon stating there are issues with them receiving emails. It's a beautiful collar, but if it's going to tear in a few months it's not worth purchasing. I would not purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After less than six months of owning this collar (and ...
customer_reviews.text: After less than six months of owning this collar (and using it only lightly and not even daily), it simply snapped off of my puppies neck while he was wearing it. The "leather" had ripped right down the middle - not even near a stud or seam. I now suspect it is low-quality leather composite. Needless to say, this makes this product dangerous. What if I had been walking my dog next to a street at the time it ripped? Luckily, we were inside.
customer_reviews.author: DavidwithBeard

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Just received it today so I’m not sure about how it’ll last. From the initial review it seems to be good quality and the fit is correct if you follow the measurements. It’s a good translation collar if you don’t want to pay a lot while they’re growing. But it still looks good
customer_reviews.author: Izzy and Finn

customer_reviews.title: The collar is great...my dog just ate it because shes a savage
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar, it looks awesome and classy. It was perfect on my black lab/shepherd mix, except that she ended up grabbing it off of herself by catching the extra part of the belt after its put through the loop and chewed the whole thing off of herself while I was at the office, the only things left were the metal studs ><
customer_reviews.author: Mayank Tyagi

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but...
customer_reviews.text: This is made well and looks nice. It seems like it will last a long time, BUT we bought this for our GSD with a 22" neck and because there is just one close band to hold the end of the extra collar, the end flaps away quite far from the collar and looks sloppy. i would love this IF it had one more band after the D ring to tuck the end of the collar band in.
customer_reviews.author: Meeshi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the leather, the way it feels, & the fit. I measured my dogs neck several times before ordering & his neck is 21 inches. Therefore I went with that size, however it's a tad bigger than I wish it was. My dog did get sick & lost about 20 lbs, so maybe once he puts the weight back on it will fit a tad better. He was just a tad over a 100lbs, so I'm sure it will be ok once he puts the weight back on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy leather dog collars
customer_reviews.text: I think that I now have purchased 6 of them. I have a number of dogs and want something that will not easily get chewed up or broken. These keep going and are at the same time very soft for the dogs to wear. One of my female dogs has been wearing hers for approximately four years now. It is a beautiful item. I ordered brown and black and love the vibrant colors.
customer_reviews.author: LSH

customer_reviews.title: Too Bulky for our 70 lb Golden
customer_reviews.text: This collar was too thick and heavy for my golden retriever. It also runs extremely long. We ordered a large, following the advertised lengths and it was longer than what was advertised. Also a suggestion to seller is to list the width of the collar. If I’d known it was so wide, I would not have ordered in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Jaspers2010

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not durable for puppies
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t last a Day with our puppies. Pretty collar that would most likely do ok for older dogs. We have 2 puppies at 11 months and 70#. They tend to chew each other’s collars off. After 3 different style of collars we finally have gone to a chain and it’s lasting..
customer_reviews.author: doug weddle

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar - but could use  . . .
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather collar. But I purchased it big so that our 6 month old puppy would grow into it. It fits at the smallest setting, however at that size there is a lot of extra leather hanging out of the buckle and there is no retainer to hold it from flapping. Will have to wait until he grows more - would have been nice to have a leather retainer ring on the collar for the extra.
customer_reviews.author: Jacknlacosta

customer_reviews.title: Seemed like a nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Returned collar because it took way longer than I was promised and needed it. However I did take a look at it and it seemed to be good quality. I did not keep it because I ended up having to buy another before I received this one.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine P

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar! I have been looking for a leather collar for my 70 lb. Boxer boy for awhile. Most of the nice looking ones are pricey. I ordered this one because it looked beautiful and had very good reviews...but I was thinking that the leather would probably be cheap/thin/stiff. Nope. It's a beautiful collar. The leather is very sturdy and supple. The metal studs and rings are lovely. I wanted something that was rugged looking without going all the way to a spiked collar. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: I love this one it has lasted through the puppy playing ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this collar because our new puppy loves to chew on my big dogs padded leather collar and has torn it all up. I love this one it has lasted through the puppy playing and chewing on his collar. Fully recommend it’s long lasting and very nice looking and won’t shred up easy if it gets chewed on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, fine craftsmanship and very nicely priced.
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully crafted; very attractive and sturdy. We have a striking faun colored Boxer. This collar complements her beauty. Because it is also sturdy, it is her collar when she goes on lead in her community such as PetSmart and Lowes. The softness of the underside keeps our girl comfortable too.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Giunta, MS, CRAADC

customer_reviews.title: beautiful collar
customer_reviews.text: the collar is well made but for one thing. The part that sticks out thru the hole when the collar is fastened around the neck curls inward making it look cheaper than the rest of it. Wish you could have secured the stitching there.
customer_reviews.author: Avacal

customer_reviews.title: D ring leather reinforcement broke first day
customer_reviews.text: The collar looks to be well made, except my medium size Border Collie is too strong for it. The D ring leather reinforcement broke the first day....other than that, we will to see how long the rest of the collar will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Gingerspice56

customer_reviews.title: Very cute but a  bit too long
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my Doberman mix, almost exactly what I was looking for. It is a bit long but not too bad. One thing that really bothered me was that the envelope it arrived in was ripped open everything was there but the thought of someone going through my stuff did not sit well with me.
customer_reviews.author: Malisa Elizehi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the the collar. It's sturdy and the color combination is beautiful. Looks amazing on our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Gina G

customer_reviews.title: Zeus approved
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar, I ordered the biggest one, fits my 34inch tall, 135lb Great Dane perfectly, fits him on the fourth notch and there’s two more to go, meets expectations, it is soft leather so it’s for looks only, as far as durability I cannot attest, he’s only worn it for a night lol but will update on that if it does not last.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Best one out there!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing collar. It came in the mail with it nicely cleaned and shined. The leather is pressed nicely and doesn’t shed. The clips and rings and sturdy and nicely secured. It’s soft and doesn’t feel to heavy or bulky. Absolutely the best leather collar I’ve gotten off of Amazon or anywhere else. 10/10 recommended. Fantastic quality
customer_reviews.author: Lori B. Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a whole 11 days!
customer_reviews.text: 11 days! It lasted 11 days! My 40lb shepherd pup pulled apart the "Superior Strength" D Ring. It's not welded, just squeezed together but hidden on the back side. I want to know why! I had to squeeze it back together with very little pressure from pliers after chasing my dog down the street! What a joke! Yeah, I'm mad. Quality is a figment of history these days. This company should be ashamed at how many pets are going to be killed on the roads because of cheap crap like this!
customer_reviews.author: Capt Krank

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I have an outdoor Rottweiler. She has lost or torn ever other collar I've ever put on her. Except for this one. It has held on with no signs of coming off. It fits comfortably around her neck. I definitely recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly thick leather. Had to get it because the puppy chews nylon ones right off the dogs. It has teeth Mark's, but so far is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jess C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent craftsmanship in this collar!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Beautiful collar! You just don't see this kind of craftsmanship much anymore. This is really beautiful crafted from one piece of leather. This will last my dog's entire lifetime. Highly recommend. Nice thick leather just can't tell you how beautiful it is. Very durable, so strong, yet comfortable and soft. So glad I bought this!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Rascal gives it two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.text: Was having trouble with my other collars, somehow the dog would just come unlatched So even with this collar he got loose again. I think the collar buckle is throwing the thumb latch. So I latched it on the other d ring and haven’t had a problem sence. But the collar is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for something that will fit my Dane without irritating him. This collar is perfect and has been lasting for a few months now. It's easy to put on and take off, and its soft enough that he can sleep in it without irritation. It looks great and doesnt seem to be breaking or ripping at all.
customer_reviews.author: BrAlSa

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: The collar is already a deep crack in the leather. My dog weighs only 30 pounds. My fear it is going to cpmpletely break into.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Lover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, however the excellent quality of this collar compelled a review. The leather is very soft and plyable. I have paid over $60.00 for other collars and they can’t touch the quality of this one. These collars are a steal! If I could I would give it 10 stars!
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Got this six months ago for our Daniff pup and have been extremely happy with this collar. Now at almost 8 months and 90lb I'll be ordering the next size up. This has been a very durable collar that's held up to a lot of puppy energy pulling. It has softened up quite a bit but that hasn't affected durability at all.
customer_reviews.author: gp

customer_reviews.title: Love the Collar!
customer_reviews.text: This collar looks great, feels great to my pup and is sturdy. It’s not too thick or too thin and holds his name plate well. I recommend
customer_reviews.author: Super Woman

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Runs large .. cannot wait til my lil man gets big enough to wear it. I purchased a smaller one for now !!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, sturdy collar for my 40lb pit bull.
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar. The closures are strong and shiny. It's durable, real leather. The studs are a nice touch. My dog looks so handsome!!! . The puppy even chewed a piece of the leather, but we were able to cut it. My dog has worn this for 6 months and it endures all the leash pulling and grass rolling he can give it and looks great. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Niblock

customer_reviews.title: This collar is a well crafted awesome value. My furbaby looks so handsome in his ...
customer_reviews.text: This collar is a well crafted awesome value. My furbaby looks so handsome in his big boy collar. Like other reviews have said, it does run large. For the hanging piece I just put an elastic hair tie to hold it in place. Problem resolved, and he still has room to grow. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have a Staffordshire Terrier and this collar is wonderful on him. The collar is soft leather, strong and durable and allows room for a growing pup. The collar has withstood him chewing on it and it looks good. Great product and a nice investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too wide but nice.
customer_reviews.text: I personally think the collar is too wide for my dogs neck but it is a nice collar. I ordered a large and it was too long for my Pitbull Terrier.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Strong
customer_reviews.text: 52 lb puppy and still growing. Strong dog and needed something that would hold up to her on a leash. Sturdy, looks well made and secure. When asked about how it feels on her, the response was "Woof, pant pant"
customer_reviews.author: David M  Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very long collars so just pay close attention to the size as the seller recommends in the ad.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed. So much so that I bought a second, smaller one. This represents my idea of quality materials and construction never mind the low price.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect collar for my pitty
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this great looking collar. My dog gets compliments on it all the time, and people are shocked when I tell them how afforable it was. I'd recommend it to anyone, brown and brass is super sharp on a brindle.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Felix

customer_reviews.title: Smells!
customer_reviews.text: Smell of petroleum is strong for a good couple months. But after it wore off it’s a nice collar.
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my dog and was exactly what I was looking for. The only thing is that if you're using the last hole on the collar the excess flaps around, so I tuck it back into the d ring. Otherwise, I love it and its softness!
customer_reviews.author: Glyn L.

customer_reviews.title: The hardware is very nice and the leather is very soft and it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: The hardware is very nice and the leather is very soft and it looks great. I am not a dog leash expert but the leash and collar from this company seem to be top shelf quality to me. In addition, the price is very cheap, I just adopted a dog so I bought a temporary collar/leash from pet-valu or whatever and what I bought was utter garbage and it was more expensive than this collar/leash.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Thanasoulis

customer_reviews.title: Love the dog collars.!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The dog collar is very well made and they r very nice.!!! I bought a large n medium one for our mastiffs.!!! Great product and good price.!!!!our dogs weigh around 60 lbs. n 90 lbs.very glad I got them.!!!
customer_reviews.author: s.m.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Loved this collar, looked amazing on our Rottweiler, but it broke right in half after about 2 weeks of wearing it. We never even used it on walks or hooked it to anything so there was no constant pulling etc. extremely disappointed and I expected more out of this!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Can not beat the price for a genuine leather collar. I have a boxer and defiantly sturdy enough for him. Also looks great on him :)
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: AN EXCELLENT SOFT ALL LEATHER COLLAR.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the package this collar was credibly soft and my 80 lb. Labradoodle loves it. A Medium was perfect for her with ample extra room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: sjm

customer_reviews.title: Good one
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, only problem is the end curled up and my dog kept chewing on it, may be we should have brought a smaller one.. well thats our mistake for not getting the correct size 😒
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick leather, metal rings are plated.
customer_reviews.text: The collar was as expected. It ran a bit large actually. The leather is really thick. The only thing I would mention is that the finish wore off the ring fairly quickly. I like the way it looks that way too. I added some more rivets to make it even more blingy.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Wash

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size description
customer_reviews.text: Good value looks like quality leather but sizing is off, my dogs neck is 25+ inches and the large is waaay to big for him.
customer_reviews.author: Rj

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty high quality collar
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty high quality collar. Better than expected. I thought the price was low and would get a poor quality one, but it's way better than expected
customer_reviews.author: KXXX

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Boxer!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect collar for my Boxer! Durable and beautifuly designed. Fast delivery. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: ShaDemps

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Leather is thick, yet pliable. Looks nice. So far, so good. Collar has "unique" odor, but disappears after about a week. I have Large size. Sizing is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for strong dogs
customer_reviews.text: Solid quality and durability. Exactly what I wanted and need. Size was tad large for my growing Doberman’s neck so I added a hole.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: superior quality
customer_reviews.text: excellent high quality. I love the 2 big loops for tags and leash. It's exactly what I needed for my 10 month old German Shepherd puppy. It will last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Collar
customer_reviews.text: Has held up well so far. Dog usually snaps the collar D ring around 6-8 weeks so jury still out but seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL D

customer_reviews.title: disappointed it is mad in China
customer_reviews.text: I am not going to use it until my young dog grows into it but looks solid and strong, disappointed it is mad in China.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Love this collar
customer_reviews.text: This collar is great. Love the double rings and it looks great on my 4 month old puppy. Leather is soft so no issues there. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Riley

customer_reviews.title: It is a nicely made color and is substantial
customer_reviews.text: It is a nicely made color and is substantial. The only negative is that depending on how it is adjusted for width the tags hang on the side of the neck and not the bottom because the buckles are heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Krickitt

customer_reviews.title: Quality built Leather Dog Collar
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I did not keep this. It was wider than I thought. But the product was quality built.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this collar for about 3 months now. It’s looks great on my pup, is strong and the metal work is sturdy. (I have a 60 lb puller). The metal on it has tarnished a little bit but no big deal. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: K. whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Not too good
customer_reviews.text: The product keep straching till my dogs chewed it to pieces
customer_reviews.author: Kerry James Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & sturdy leather collar
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful & nicely made. I haven't tested its durability yet since I ordered it too big right now for my doberman puppy which he will grow into soon.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna J Fluegge

customer_reviews.title: It will not break!
customer_reviews.text: I have a female husky who is very active and beyond hyper. She had broken 4 collars previous to this one. Let me tell you, this collar has lasted by far, the longest on her! It seems comfortable, durable to weather, biting/chewing on it, as well as stylish. I totally recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Quintana

customer_reviews.title: A great collar!
customer_reviews.text: We love this collar! Not only does it look sharp but it is sturdy, especially for the price! Our dog weighs about 50lbs and we ordered the small. Its perfect in size!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Very nice collar
customer_reviews.text: Very nice collar! Great leather look. Sturdy rings. Looks just as good as the pictures. My pit has been wearing it for over a month now. No issues and very sturdy when walking on leash. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: xmrritex

customer_reviews.title: If chained to the collar, it wont be the weakest link.
customer_reviews.text: As described, I used it for my 70 pound lab and it was a bit bigger but it left room for growth. Well made leather for strength.
customer_reviews.author: Richard B Mator

customer_reviews.title: I think the collar is plenty strong and will work for me.
customer_reviews.text: The collar appears to be made of two strips of split leather sewn together as opposed to one thick piece of leather.
customer_reviews.author: snow dog

customer_reviews.title: Great product, wrong animal.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but not good for my dog !!! I have a press/ cane corso mix and he has chewed through 3 in the past 6 months, so I give up !!!
customer_reviews.author: LARRY  R BELL JR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing collar!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing collar!! It fit my one year old doberman pinscher. It does have a smell to it, my husband compared it to a flea collar but it isn't terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It's very well made and exactly what I was hoping for, a big solid collar.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice leather collar for a big dog. I wish I had a belt this nice!
customer_reviews.author: CSC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome collar!
customer_reviews.text: I love this collar! Not only is it good quality but looks so good on my dog as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and soft
customer_reviews.text: My black native shepard seem to like it, easier to control her on leash.
customer_reviews.author: brupow

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: Not durable enough to take on my German Shepherd/Husky mix. It lasted about 3 hours before she was playing with her new leather chew toy.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Color
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar! I got this for my female pit! It looks great and doesn't rub. I did order a large, she could definitely wear a medium instead. We just cut off the extra slack since she is 3 gives her plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Hysteriahill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are thick, REAL leather! Very very nice. Was not expecting that for the price I paid! Extremely pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Collar
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction and well crafter leather. It is not a hard leather but it is VERY solid and not some cheap piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good leather collar for the price, wish it was a bit wider but its soft and durable
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Beiru Collar
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, reasonable price, came quick. This is the second one I bought.
customer_reviews.author: BOB NELSON

customer_reviews.title: Great value! You can’t go wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful dog collar! Looks great has nice metal accents. The brown looks great on a black lab!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Runs a little large so sorry I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Feldott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My fog loved this collar right from the start. Looks great on him!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Great collar and price!
customer_reviews.text: My golden doodle has been wearing this collar for over a year and the leather is still in great shape! Only con is that the metal has changed colors over time, which is why I’m buying a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: mary allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I have used this color for my puppy dog, I am vary satisfied with quality. No regrets. Having little design might looks even better.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment for the price. Not to bulky and not to small for some what larger dogs. I can not speak to its long term durability but the hardware all seems very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the quality and the look of it. It was way nicer than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.author: Maalani Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy will not hold an extra large dog!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this collar when I first got it. But, within a month the collar broke in 3 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar will use it on my Border Collie puppy once she grows into it.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great dog collar
customer_reviews.text: So far, this has been the best dog collar. I love having two places to attach the leash.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Great collar, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Holding up great with my rough and tumble Bullmastiff:) I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: WORKED GOOD FOR A FEW MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT IN APRIL LAST WEEK IN BROKE IN HALF BUT THANKS STLL
customer_reviews.author: BAMABOY

customer_reviews.title: Made Well
customer_reviews.text: This collar is well made and looks beautiful on my dog. I actually ordered a size to big the first time and had to reorder a size smaller. He’s a pup so he will eventually grow into the other one which is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Seck

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking and very well made leather dog collar. I was extremely happy with the quality for the price. I have 4 large dogs, and I would definitely recommend this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Tracie

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏾
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and worth buying if you have large breed dogs. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Deepan

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this collar for my 6 month old Pit Bull. It’s beautiful and better than expected. Love the look and feel of it. Now I need a brass name tag.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Great collar
customer_reviews.text: Love this collar, looks great on my boxer and seems to be high quality. Received on time and as expected. No issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amber White

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful collar seems to be sturdy and good quality. The medium was still kinda large but he will definitely grow into it as he is still a pup!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but has a BAD odor!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of leather is great and as advertised but has a strong chemical smell that I can't get rid of. Not sure if its from the tanning process or what but smells like automotive oil which is not pleasant on a dog.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

product_meta.title: Beirui Dog Collar Leather - Soft Genuine Latigo Leather Made - Best Choice for Daily Walking or Sports Training
feature_bullets: ♠ FULL GRAIN REAL LEATHER - Top grade leather imported from US, high quality craft keep our collar sturdy enough to last for a long time using

♠ HEAVY DUTY ALLOY D-RING - There is a heavy duty D-ring on the back of the collar and it makes leash attachment easier. 4 mushroom rivets studded to keep the D-ring strong enough to hold Mocha dogs up to 150 lbs
♠ GREAT ADJUSTMENT - There are 6 eyelets for adjustment.You can easy to find a proper hole for dog wearing

♠ MEASUREMENT - Collar size is 16"-21" adjustable. It is very important for shopping collars for pets. When you use tapes to measure your pet's neck circumference,please leave one finger gap to keep dog relax and comfortable

♠ WARRANTY - We Berry is the oringal manufacture of this product. And this is a reasonable price for such a nice collar. When you get it in your hand and you'll find it worth every pence of your money. We provide a 180 days quality guarantee
